name: Dualities
description:
Description

Dualities is a 2D side-scrolling platformer which puts the players in the shoes of a boy in search of his inner self. Switch between his two personalities to go through any obstacles in your path. This project was created for the Talent Group program from BINUS Game Development Club.

Controls

  • [RMB] - Switch between two personalities (Ego and Id)
  • Ego (Grey) can build platforms, enter the build viewport by tapping [E], [LMB] will summon the platform on cursor and [Esc] will exit the action
  • Id (Red) can dash by tapping [A+LMB = Left Dash] or [D+LMB = Right Dash]

Credits

  • Willson Beaver (Project Manager)
  • Grady Christian (Game Designer)
  • Justin Christian (Programmer)
  • Kalyana Pundarika (2D Artist)
  • Martania Maharani (2D Artist)
  • Kay Raphael Leonico (Sound Engineer)
  • Mulia Darma (Project Supervisor)
